entries.quest_accepted: You have accepted a Force-sensitive quest.  Please note that you are only able to accept one Force-sensitive quest per village stage.
entries.power_shrine_d: A glowing crystal that pulsates with power.
entries.convert_not_enough_for_conversion: You do not have any valid experience types to convert.
entries.convert_no_skill: You do not have the appropriate skill to convert that type.
entries.created_on_ground: Your inventory was too full, an item falls out onto the ground. It would be wise to stop and pick it up.
entries.have_buff: This crystal is unable to enhance your abilities any more at this time.
entries.buff_applied: You feel infused with the crystal's energies.
entries.timer_not_up: the crystal has not recharged yet.
entries.convert_allocate_more_xp: The converted experience would be zero.  Allocate more experience.
entries.convert_at_fs_skill_cap: You are already at the maximum for that experience type.
entries.convert_not_enough_xp: You do not have enough experience to convert that much.
entries.convert_illegal_type: That is an illegal experience type.
entries.no_available_branches: There are no branches left for you to unlock.
entries.no_free_branches: You do not have any free branch unlocks remaining.
entries.select_branch: Select the skill branch that you wish to unlock.
